title: On Presidentâ€™s notice, CAA waives off charges for wheel chairs
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 26 (APP):Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) Friday directed airlines to refrain from receiving money for providing facility of wheel chairs to handicapped persons and elderly.
The instructions were issued after President Dr Arif Alvi took notice of the matter raised in social media.
The President in a letter asked the aviation authority to either wave off the charges or ask airlines to bear the cost of providing wheel chairs to the persons in need.
